raw_comment:
1 I notice that out of the Young women reach out to their parents more than young men. This is proven through the percents on the graph
2 i wonder why young women reach out more than young men. Is there a sense of independence in men or a feeling of maturity?
3 This relates to my community because many people are leaving to college soon so people are progressing into their young adult life. It is interesting to see what will happen.
4 why do boys not reach out as much? 
5 young adults and their attachment level
ace_sentences: Young women reach out to their parents more than young men.
The percents on the graph prove this claim.
I wonder why young women reach out to their parents more than young men.
Young men may have a sense of independence.
Young men may have a feeling of maturity.
This topic relates to my community.
Many people in my community will leave for college soon.
These people will become young adults.
It is interesting to see what will happen in the future.
I wonder why boys do not reach out to their parents as much as young women do.
Young adults have an attachment level.
